Keywords: Cosmic , Defenders , Herald
Real Name: Norrin Radd
Special Powers
THE SILVER STREAK: Hypersonic Speed. When Silver Surfer uses it, after resolutions knock back each character 1 square that he moved through during the action in a direction of your choosing (may choose a different direction for each character).
